ovdesc.p: SC.SECURITY.MARGIN can be created to capture the margin rate by company wise.

desc.p: Indicates the percentage margin allowable on this Security.
If not entered, the margin allowed for the SECURITY.MASTER will be used.
Example: 70 = 70% Margin (stock is worth 70% face value for Client valuation purposes).
Must exist on the MARGIN.CONTROL file.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
